posts.title: Mini Tabletop Desktop Warfare Kit
posts.content: Learn about ancient warfare during your down time at the office by assembling your own mini tabletop ballista. Modeled after the iconic and deadly weapon of the Roman Empire, this pint sized version can fire a payload at distances exceeding thirty feet.

posts.title: 3D Virtual Mobile Theater
posts.content: Feel like you’re in your very own private theater every time you watch a movie by playing it on this 3D virtual mobile theater. It provides superb sound and features an AMOLED display that creates a virtual 800” giant curved screen experience for your viewing pleasure.

posts.title: Switchblade Hair Comb
posts.content: Comb your hair like a total badass with the switchblade hair comb. After pulling out this bad boy everyone will get tense thinking things are about to get messy, til you hit the switch and a fancy little comb comes out everyone comments on how undeniably cool you are.

posts.title: Multicolor Light Show Lamp
posts.content: Create the ideal environment for any occasion by customizing the lighting using this multicolor light show lamp. The compact size fits easily on any nightstand and features four different music programs along with twenty distinct lighting and color combinations.

posts.title: Beer For Dogs
posts.content: You do everything your with your dog – so why not drink with him too? With Bowser, the beer for the dogs, your best friend can join you on nights of drunken debauchery – acting as your wingman while picking up chicks, and having your back while you foolishly fight larger men.

posts.title: Floating Light Up Globes
posts.content: Create the perfect moonlit environment any night with the floating light up globes. Even if the smog and light pollution have taken over the nighttime sky, these versatile and portable light globes provide all the ambiance and lighting your home or yard require.

posts.title: Astronaut Smartphone Mount
posts.content: There’s no need to request permission from Houston when you’re looking to dock your drained phone on the astronaut smartphone mount. Now anytime you’re looking for a charge, simply place the phone on the astronaut’s thrusterpack.

posts.title: Major Scale Musical Wine Glasses
posts.content: Have a little fun while you relax and booze it up by creating beautiful music with these major scale musical wine glasses. Simply fill your glass to the desired note, moisten your finger, and create a wondrous sound as you run it across the rim of the glass.

posts.title: R/C Spy Camera Nano Helicopter
posts.content: Get a bird’s eye view of the world without raising too much attention by flying this R/C spy camera nano helicopter. It features a gyro stabilizer and digital proportional controls for smooth flying and can record video or shoot images at 640×480 resolution.

posts.title: Harry Potter Chess Board
posts.content: Recreate the iconic chess game scene from the Sorcerer’s Stone right in your living room using this Harry Potter chess board. Each of the 32 pieces in this authentic replica are modeled after the magical creatures found on the Hogwarts chess board.

posts.title: Giant Flip-Cup Cups
posts.content: When it comes to drinking games, bigger is always better! So multiply the fun of your favorite party game by swapping out those dinky red cups for these giant flip-cup cups! The set comes with 8 giant cups measuring 7.75″ in diameter and standing 12″ tall.

posts.title: Spy Video Watch
posts.content: Enact your wildest espionage fantasies by recording your surroundings using this spy video watch. This James Bond inspired gadget fits discreetly on your wrist and is designed to capture twenty minutes of video or forty minutes of audio.
